Ver 1.3 Minigun重置,管道触发修改等..Translation: Ver 1.3 Minigun reset, pipe trigger modifications, etc. EN Translation: Allenw @ Ozlin server

无线电: 干得漂亮,士兵们,看来你们顺利上列车了..Translation: Radio: Well done, soldiers. It seems you have successfully boarded the train.

无线电: 现在我将调整你们的行动代号为Filth..Translation: Radio: I will now change your codename to Filth.

呼叫指挥部,这里是代号Filth,火车已经到隧道半程了..Translation: Calling Command, this is Filth. The train has reached halfway through the tunnel.

那头机械巨兽几乎抹去了我们一半的战士,我们需要增援..Translation: That mechanical beast has wiped out almost half of our soldiers; we need reinforcements.

无线电: 明白了,我会派遣一支精锐部队前往你们的坐标附近..Translation: Radio: Understood, I will send an elite unit to your coordinates.

无线电: 代号Filth,关于NPST行动的协议....Translation: Radio: Codename Filth, regarding the NPST operation agreement...

他妈的,终究还是发生了吗...Translation: Damn it, has it finally happened..

无线电: 代号Filth,发生什么了,赶紧回复..Translation: Radio: Codename Filth, what happened? Respond quickly.

后车厢的队友被病毒异化了,他们在攻击列车!.Translation: The teammates in the rear carriage have been mutated by the virus; they are attacking the train!

长官,你收到了吗....长官,指挥部!.Translation: Commander, do you copy.... Commander, Command!

去你妈的,信号被切断了!.Translation: Damn it, the signal has been cut off!

所有人抓稳!我们必须让列车脱轨了!.Translation: Everyone hold on! We have to derail the train!

我靠..我们还活着..看来还没到该死去的时候..Translation: Wow.. we are still alive.. Looks like it's not time to die yet.

隧道前面已经被严重污染了..Translation: The tunnel ahead has been severely contaminated.

我们得想办法绕出去,也许还能找到新的列车..Translation: We need to find a way to go around; maybe we can find a new train.

但愿我们能挺过去..Translation: Hopefully we can get through this.

出发吧,士兵们,武运隆昌..Translation: Let's go, soldiers, may fortune be with us.
